message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_CHEQUENO_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Check do not have check number details populated.
The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Cheque do not have cheque number details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALCHQAMT_INVALID
message.locale: Le dossier du paiement reçu ne peut pas être chargé, car le montant vérifié total n’est pas le même que le montant du chèque reçu.
The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalCheckAmount control total does not equal the total cheque amount received.

message.name: INF_TOTAL_CHQ_AMOUNT_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total amount for all Cheque payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n
Total amount for all Cheque payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n
